column.name: SERVICE_NAME
column.description: Name of the Service Type which will be used just for the reference (ex: CRM, ContactManager, Support, etc.)

column.name: ORG_TYPE
column.description: Type of the SOID. The type is differentiated per service

column.name: DOMAIN
column.description: Portal / Domain Name of the Service Org

column.name: IS_PRIMARY
column.description: Make this Domain as Default Domain for the Service Org

column.name: IS_VERIFIED
column.description: To identify if the domain ownership is verified

column.name: DOMAIN_TYPE
column.description: 0 - PortalName | 1 - Domain

column.name: ENVIRONMENT
column.description: 1 - Production, 2 - Sandbox, 3- Development (To identify for which enivornment the domain is mapped)

column.name: PARENT_ZAAID
column.description: ZAAID / ZSOID of Parent Account. `MIGRATED_TO_ORG` will be changed to `true` if parent account is AppAccount type.

column.name: DIRECTORY_ZAAID
column.description: ZAAID of Directory Account. `MIGRATED_TO_ORG` will be changed to `true`.

column.name: IS_EXPOSED
column.description: 1 - External, 2 - Internal

column.name: PARENT_ORG_TYPE
column.description: Type of the SOID / AppAccount. Value `16` represents AppAccount or org type of respective SOID services.

column.name: ENVIRONMENT
column.description: 1 - Production, 2 - Sandbox, 3- Development

table.name: IAMServiceOrgSubService
table.description: This will conatin Zoho App for which the members are belongs.

column.name: SUB_ORG_TYPE
column.description: Sub type of the SOID. The type is differentiated per service and will contain sub service's org type

column.name: ZUID
column.description: The creator of this account

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.description: A short description about this account. Used for display purpose

column.name: ACCOUNT_STATUS
column.description: Current status of the account Active - 1, Inactive - 0, Closed - 2

column.name: PARENT_ZAAID
column.description: ZAAID / ZSOID of Parent Account. `MIGRATED_TO_ORG` will be changed to `true` if parent account is AppAccount type.

column.name: DIRECTORY_ZAAID
column.description: ZAAID of Directory Account. `MIGRATED_TO_ORG` will be changed to `true`.

column.name: IS_EXPOSED
column.description: 1 - External, 2 - Internal

column.name: PARENT_ORG_TYPE
column.description: Type of the SOID / AppAccount. Value `16` represents AppAccount or org type of respective SOID services.

column.name: ENVIRONMENT
column.description: 1 - Production, 2 - Sandbox, 3- Development

column.name: CONFIG_NAME
column.description: Name of the configuration in dot notation format. For example, {feature}.{parameter}

column.name: CONFIG_VALUE
column.description: Value of the configuration. The value can be set during deployment and can be changed in run time from Zoho Accounts Admin Console

table.name: IAMServiceOrgOAuthAccessGrant
table.description: SO Admin granting access to third party apps to use an OrgOAuthToken on behalf of him/her serviceorg

column.name: IP_ADDRESS
column.description: The IP Address of the user at the time of this access grant.

column.name: USER_AGENT
column.description: Using which browser or device the access has been made.

column.name: CREATED_TIME
column.description: The time at which the grant is given

table.name: IAMSOOAuthAccessGrantScopes
table.description: This table will contain default/allowed scopes for the particular serviceorg.

column.name: SCOPE_ID
column.description: ID of the scope required. Will have from App.SCOPE_ID

table.name: IAMServiceOrgMember
table.description: Members belong to a Service Org

column.name: IS_ACTIVE
column.description: 0 - In Active User, 1 - Active User, 2 - Deleted User

column.name: USER_ROLE
column.description: 0 - Normal User, 1 - Moderator, 2 - Admin

column.name: USER_TYPE
column.description: 1 - Normal, 2 - Free User

column.name: ZARID
column.description: Service Org Member roles

column.name: ZAID
column.description: The Account ID which are mapped to the Service Org. Ex: ZAID of the Client Portal Account.

table.name: IAMServiceOrgAccountMapping
table.description: Service team what to store some unique data such Facebook App Id(LiveDesk), Twitter Profile ID(Support), etc associated with a ServiceOrg. Those data has to be unique and they should able to identify ZSOID based on that property

column.name: ACCOUNT_ID
column.description: Unique Identifier

column.name: ACCOUNT_TYPE
column.description: Constants defined by Service to identify the Account.

column.name: ACCOUNT_NAME
column.description: Uniuqe Account Name such as Facebook App Id, Twitter Profile ID, etc.

column.name: ADDRESS_TYPE
column.description: 1 - Work (2^0), 2 - Residential current(2^1), 4 - Residential permanent(2^2), 8 - KYC Address(2^3)

table.name: IAMServiceOrgKYC
table.description: The KYC deatils for the serviceorg

column.name: ZUID
column.description: The zuid of the serviceorg admin

column.name: EMPLOYEE_COUNT
column.description: The employess count of the organisation

column.name: ORGANISATION_NAME
column.description: Name of the Organisation

column.name: INDUSTRY
column.description: The type of industory/sector

column.name: ORG_CONTACT_EMAILID
column.description: The Email id of the org contact

column.name: FIRST_NAME
column.description: The First Name of the org contact

column.name: LAST_NAME
column.description: The Last Name of the org contact

column.name: MOBILE_NUMBER
column.description: The Mobile Number of the org contact

column.name: DESIGNATION
column.description: The Designation of the org contact

table.name: IAMServiceOrgKYCContact
table.description: The contact information of the serviceorg admin

column.name: EMAIL_ID
column.description: The EMAIl ID of the contact person

column.name: FIRST_NAME
column.description: The First Name of the contact person

column.name: LAST_NAME
column.description: The Last Name of the contact person

column.name: STATUS
column.description: 0 - PENDING, 1 - Accepted, 2 - REJECTED

column.name: USER_ROLE
column.description: 0 - Normal User, 1 - Moderator, 2 - Admin

column.name: USER_TYPE
column.description: 1 - Normal, 2 - Free User

column.name: RESEND_LIMIT
column.description: Restriction Limit for resending account invitation

column.name: REJECTED_COUNT
column.description: User Invitation Rejected count

column.name: ACCEPT_URL
column.description: Url to be redirected on accept

column.name: REJECT_URL
column.description: Url to be redirected on reject

column.name: IDP
column.description: Used to invoke directly to idp openid not to accounts register page.

column.name: ARGS_DATA
column.description: Other data used in digest is stored as JSON object.

column.name: INVITED_USER_AUTOID
column.description: Unique Identifier For InvitedOrg details

column.name: ORG_ID
column.description: Invited org id(ZSOID or ZAAID)

column.name: ORG_TYPE
column.description: The type is differentiated per service for sub service case

column.name: STATUS
column.description: 0 - Inactive, 1 - Active

column.name: ARGS_DATA
column.description: Other data used in digest is stored as JSON object.

column.name: INVITATION_TIME
column.description: User invitation time

column.name: User_ServiceOrg_Preference_AUTOID
column.description: Unique Identifier for each user preference for service org type entry

column.name: ORG_TYPE
column.description: Actual Org type for the User to support SubService Models

column.name: ZUID
column.description: The creator of this account

column.name: PREFERENCE_KEY
column.description: Unique key service uses for User preference

column.name: PREFERENCE_VALUE
column.description: Default app account zaaid

column.name: PartnerZAAID_AUTOID
column.description: Unique Identifier for PartnerZAAID entry

column.name: DISPLAY_NAME
column.description: Display name of the AppAccount

column.name: ZID_TYPE
column.description: OrgType of the child ZID

column.name: ZID_RELATION
column.description: Relation between the partner and child zid

column.name: SERVICE_ORG_TEMP_ACC_AUTO_ID
column.description: Unique Identifier for ServiceOrgTempAccess

column.name: SUB_ORG_TYPE
column.description: Sub type of the SOID. The type is differentiated per service and will contain sub service's org type

table.name: IAMServiceOrgProductionZSOID
table.description: Mapping Sandbox/developer sorgs to the original production sorg

column.name: SORG_PROD_ZSOID_AUTO_ID
column.description: Unique Identifier for SorgProduction entry

table.name: IAMServiceOrgDevices
table.description: This will contain all the meeting room data for an org.

column.name: DEVICE_ID
column.description: Unique key for device. This will be passed in thread local

column.name: DISPLAY_NAME
column.description: Display name of device. Will be shown in UI to user. Can be used as reference while clearing the sessions

column.name: IS_ENABLED
column.description: Device is available or not
